Reference

All functions

calculate_icers()

Calculate Incremental Cost-Effectiveness Ratios (ICERs)

decisions()

Add decisions to a twig

event()

Add an event layer to a twig object

`%out%`

Negation of %in% operator

payoffs()

Add payoffs to a twig object

plot_ceac()

Plot Cost-Effectiveness Acceptability Curve (CEAC)

`+`(<twig_class>)

Define a method for the + operator for twig objects

prob2rate()

Convert Probability to Rate

rate2prob()

Convert Rate to Probability

run_twig()

Run a twig model

states()

Add Markov states to a twig

twig()

Create a new twig object
